import React from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";
import {extend} from "lodash";
 
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
import pickHtmlProps from "../utils/pick-html-props";
 
import buttonGroupStyle from "../styles/button/button-group.style";
import {buttonGroupVariationStyle} from "../styles/button/button-variation.style";
 
// var numbers = ["zero","one","two","three","four","five","six","seven","eight","nine","ten","eleven","twelve","thirteen","fourteen","fifteen","sixteen"];
 
export function ButtonGroup(props) {
 
  // var children = getChildren(props);
  const buttonGroupStyleClassNames = buttonGroupStyle();
 
  const classSet = {
    // ui: true,
    "cm-button-group": true,
    [buttonGroupStyleClassNames.group]: true,
  };
 
  let newProps = extend({classSet}, props);
 
  ["fluid","vertical","basic","divided","compact"].forEach(function(prop) {
    if (newProps[prop]) { classSet[prop] = true; }
  });
 
  ["size"].forEach(function(prop) {
    Iif (newProps[prop]) { classSet[props[prop]] = true; }
  });
 
  Iif (newProps.variation) {
    classSet[buttonGroupVariationStyle(newProps.variation,buttonGroupStyleClassNames.button)] = true;
  }
 
  newProps = pickHtmlProps(mergeProps({classSet},newProps));
 
  return <div {...newProps} />;
}
 
 
export function Or({text}) {
  return <div className="or" data-text={text} />;
}
Or.propTypes = {
  text: PropTypes.string,
};
